summary: Growth encompasses a journey of personal and strategic development. With the course Align the Misaligned, learn to discover and build on strengths, embrace and improve weaknesses, and employ SWOT analysis for clearer positioning in startup environments. It also focuses on strategic networking and resource acquisition.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
